properties.name: Ransomware Client Blocked

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Nasuni has blocked a client involved in a ransomware attack from accessing a Nasuni Edge Appliance at {{TimeGenerated}}

properties.description: Identifies malicious clients blocked by the Ransomware Protection service running on a Nasuni Edge Appliance.
properties.query:
Syslog
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, SyslogMessage
| where SyslogMessage has "The Filer has enforced the mitigation policy on volume"
| extend SrcIpAddr = substring(SyslogMessage, indexof(SyslogMessage, "(")+1, indexof(SyslogMessage, ")") - indexof(SyslogMessage,"(")-1)
| extend volume_name = substring(SyslogMessage, indexof(SyslogMessage, "volume")+7, indexof(SyslogMessage,"and") - (indexof(SyslogMessage, "volume")+7))
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
